note.p: Burial: Under the piazza of the chapel of Charterhouse School, London
Education: Charterhouse School; St John's College, Cambridge (matriculated 1719); migrated to Queens' College (1732/3); MA (Lit. Reg. 1737), DD (Lambeth 1754)

Career: Headmaster of Charterhouse (1748-1769); Prebendary of Brecknock (1748); Prebendary of Worcester (1751); Rector of Shobdon, Herefordshire; Rector of Stoke Prior, Worcestershire (1754-1764); Rector of St John, Bedwardine (1764-1775)
Notes: Both forms of name given in Venn
